scripts.build: sass -q resources/scss:resources/build & esbuild resources/ts/**/*.ts --outdir=resources/build --bundle --sourcemap & esbuild resources/css/**/* --outdir=resources/build --bundle --sourcemap --loader:.woff2=copy --loader:.eot=copy --loader:.svg=copy --loader:.ttf=copy --loader:.woff=copy --loader:.jpg=copy --loader:.gif=copy
